app.name: FCE Ultra RX
app.long_description: Featuring: - New palettes: Smooth / PVM Style D93 / Composite Direct NES Classic / PC-10 / Sony CXA / Wavebeam / VS. System - Screenshot/Cover/Artwork display. - Screenshot button. - Sharp and soft filters. - Wii U Pro Controller support. - Classic Controllers support (NES / SNES) - Wiiflow plugin mode.
